goal.en: This subject is designed for undergraduate students who are interested in knowing marine organisms and their environment. This subject is an one semester course. Interested students should have basic knowledge in General Biology before they take this subject. Students taking this subject will be introduced with ocean environment the organisms living there.
goal.ch: 介紹學生認識海洋環境與及生活其中的生物

content.en:
"This subject is designed for undergraduate students who are interested in knowing marine organisms and their environment. This subject is an one semester course. Interested students should have basic knowledge in General Biology before they take this subject. Students taking this subject will be introduced with the following topics:
1.Introduction to the ocean environment
2.Water, Waves, and tides
3.Marine Microbes
4.Seaweeds and plants
5.Lower Invertebrates
6.Higer Invertebrates
7.Marine Fishes
8.Marine Reptiles and Birds
9.Mid-term exam
10.Marine Mammals
11.Intertidal Communities
12.Estuaries
13.Coral Reef Communities
14.Continental Shelves and Neritic Zone
15.The Open Sea
16.Life in the Ocean‘s Depths
17.Field trip to the seaside
18.Final examination"

textbook.en:
"Marine Biology, 4th edition 2006, by Peter Castro and Michael E. Huber.
Introduction to marine biology, third edition 2010, by Karleskint, Turner, and Small"
textbook.ch:
"Marine Biology, 4th edition 2006, by Peter Castro and Michael E. Huber.

en: Department:Department of Life Sciences only.Year:Third Year、Fourth Year only.
Department:Minor-Life Sciences、Double Major-Department of Life Science、Minor Specialty-Biodiversity only.
ch: 系所:限生命科學系。年級:限三年級、四年級。
系所:限輔系-生命科學系、雙主修-生命科學系、第二專長-生物多樣性。
